issues.description: The UML diagram in the problem statement specifies addGuestStudents(int) returns void, but the solution implements it as boolean addGuestStudents(int). This mismatch will confuse students following the UML and lead to compilation or test failures.
issues.suggested_fix: Either change the solutionâ€™s addGuestStudents method to return void (and remove the boolean return value), or update the UML and problem description to indicate that addGuestStudents(int) should return a boolean.
